name: Kobold
description: Kobolds are small and clever, with natural trap-making and pack tactics. Dragon-blooded tricksters.

special_abilities.name: Darkvision
special_abilities.description: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.description: +12 bonus to attacks when ally is nearby

special_abilities.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
special_abilities.description: Can distract enemies to help allies

special_abilities.name: Trap Expert

special_abilities.name: Tail
special_abilities.description: Has a tail, can wear tail equipment
